summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office to Judge Kenneth M. Karas regarding the case United States v. Nicholas Tartaglione. It updates the court that video footage from inside the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) from July 22-23, 2019, requested by the defense, has been preserved and the government is obtaining a copy to make available for defense review.

persons.context: He is the defendant in the criminal case referenced (S4 16 Cr. 832 (KMK)).

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: He is the signatory of the letter, submitting it on behalf of the government.

keyFacts: The document is a formal update from the U.S. Attorney's Office to a federal judge regarding a specific defendant, Nicholas Tartaglione.
Video footage from inside the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for July 22-23, 2019, was preserved per a defense request made in July 2019.
The government is in the process of obtaining the video and will make it available for defense counsel's review at the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The case referenced is United States v. Nicholas Tartaglione, S4 16 Cr. 832 (KMK).
